response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your growth. This product holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am offering it at a special price tailored to your needs.

Considering the high quality and unique features of this product, along with its significant impact on your business, I propose to sell it to you for $1,350,000. This price not only ensures a fair return for my investment but also leaves room for you to maximize your returns on this valuable asset.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or demonstrations of the product's capabilities. I am confident that it will meet and exceed your expectations. Should you choose to proceed, I am prepared to facilitate a smooth transaction and provide all necessary support throughout the process.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
